Package it.polimi.ingsw.view.GUI

Class GUIHandler

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.view.GUI.GUIHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
ViewInterface
public class GUIHandler
extends java.lang.Object
implements ViewInterface
Class that recives informations from the controllers and takes care to call the correct display method and communicate those information to the server

    • firstPositioning

      public void firstPositioning​(java.util.List<Position> availablePos, java.util.List<java.lang.String> godName, java.util.List<java.lang.String> userName, int client, boolean isMyTurn)
      Method called for every player to set the initial positions
      Specified by:
      firstPositioning in interface ViewInterface
      Parameters:
      availablePos - list of the available postions
      godName - list of the god cards chosen
      userName - list of the usernames
      client - id of the player that recives the call scanId is used to identify the player and connect it to the worker
      isMyTurn - indicates if the player have to set the position of his worker or if he has to load the position of other player's workers
